title: From The Government's U-Turn On Fake News To Fake Images During Bharat Bandh: News You Almost Believed
subtitle: In this week's News You Almost Believed, the government flip flops on fake news guidelines and the tragic death of a policeman during Bharat Bandh protests attracts fake news.
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
In this week's news you almost believed, we begin with actual news.

TN Seshan Is Alive; Viral Messages Claiming His Death Are Fake
